BadgeDetail.Name: Numeracy
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they are confident with basic arithmetic, estimating, percentages and ratios. They can perform mental arithmetic and interpret basic statistics and graphs. Earning this badge is broadly equivalent to a level 2 qualification in maths.

Task.Title: Maths
Task.Body: If you have a grade C or above at GCSE maths or equivalent, you may upload a scan of your certificate to achieve this badge automatically.Otherwise, complete the free online Citizen Maths course and upload your completion certificate.
